mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device (name, type, location, uid) VALUES (#{name}, #{type}, #{location}, #{uid})
mapper.update: UPDATE device SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, location = #{location} WHERE did = #{did}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM device WHERE uid = #{uid}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT d.did) FROM device d JOIN ( SELECT m1.did FROM message m1 WHERE m1.status > 0 AND m1.timestamp = ( SELECT MAX(m2.timestamp) FROM message m2 WHERE m2.did = m1.did ) ) AS latest_active_message ON d.did = latest_active_message.did WHERE d.uid = #{uid}

SELECT d.did, d.name, d.type, d.location, m.status, d.uid FROM device AS d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT did, MAX(timestamp) AS max_timestamp FROM message GROUP BY did ) AS latest_msg ON d.did = latest_msg.did LEFT JOIN message AS m ON d.did = m.did AND latest_msg.max_timestamp = m.timestamp WHERE d.uid = 123;
